Reviews.Title: Short Range
Reviews.Author: SilentWarrior
Reviews.Content: This product has very limited range. I had to add wire to the antenna to get enough range (10 feet).

ProductInfo.Features: This is a Wireless Camera Video Transmitter Converter with the BNC video input, there also comes with a BNC to RCA video converter for RCA video signal. With this converter, you can get your wired camera video convert to 2.4GHz wireless.
ProductInfo.Name: SC2000 2.4GHz 4CH Wireless Video Transmitter w/BNC Converter for Camera/Security System Color Black
